message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $10,000 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the product is worth significantly more to me. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $13,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $11,000 for the product.
